import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs';

<Meta title="Releases/v0.5.x/v0.5.2/Changelog" />

# v0.5.2 (October 17,2022)

## ⛔️ Breaking Changes
* Changes in components which `input` element.
* Removed v-focus-first directive.
* Add missing attrs props to the components.
* Make components more generic. Remove Triage specific artefacts.

## 🚀 Features
* Add [UiMenu](/docs/organisms-menu--with-selected-item) component.
* Husky pre-push hook to run tests and autogenerated files scripts before pushing.
* Add stories with SVG's models from Triage application.
* Accessibility improvements for screen readers of [UiScale](/docs/molecules-scale--common) mild and unbearable buttons.

## 🧹 Refactor
* Rewrite [UiLoader](/docs/molecules-loader--common) component.
* Use defaultProps as poxy for some props default values.

## 🐛 Fixes
* Typos in [UiMenu](/docs/organisms-menu--with-selected-item) component.
* TS errors
* Shifted steps markers in [UiProgressbar](/docs/molecules-progressbar--with-dots) component.

## 🧹 Chores
* Use type assertions instead interface for defaultProps.
* Bump Storybook to 6.5.12
* Object property in new lines.

## 📄 Docs
* Add Team page to docs.
